This class displays the submenu for the Inflexible portfolios.
InflexiblePF(StockView, Model, String, ArrayList<LocalDate>) - Constructor for class controller.InflexiblePF
Constructs a Inflexible portfolio that calls the model and view to perform various actions on an inflexible portfolio such as creation, upload, getting composition, total.
